summary:
Evok ENB - A bit of a drab fellow.  This enb is imbibed with his melancholy mood for a dramatic and dark atmospheric effect.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Friends ENB - A group of jolly chaps!  Their bright smiles have infected this enb with a colorful cheer.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=silver][b][size=+3]Community ENB[/size][/b][/color][/center]

[center][youtube]_wRScQZRmOI[/youtube][/center]                                       
[center][b]Vid courtesy of [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/hodilton?feature=results_main]hodilton[/url] 

[img]http://www.imageups.com/img/uploads/big/d9d99b12d7.jpg[/img]
Screenshot by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/905814]Rosendaemonin[/url]


[color=YELLOW][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/color]

1. Download: 
[url= http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0119.htm] 0.119 binary[/url] and place the d3d9.dll file into your Skyrim folder.  (Where the SkyrimLauncher is located)

2. Download my enb preset and install all files in the same location as 0.119 dll. (skyrim main folder)

3. Use with Dark Dungeons:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12454 via artemis

4.  Calibrate your monitor ( http://www.lagom.nl/lcd-test/) and pay special attention to your gamma.  Set ingame brightness to the center.  If using LED monitor you may want to set the ingame brightness one to two clicks left of center.


And please, if you liked it, just take one second to [color=YELLOW]ENDORSE[/color] and support my work ! 

[img]http://www.imageups.com/img/uploads/big/6c8d6c28db.png[/img]

[color=YELLOW][u]CREDITS[/u][/color]
[color=red][u]Also included in the Read Me[/u][/color]

[color=red][u]IndigoNeko:[/u][/color]  You deserve an award for putting up with me!  I pestered this guy with a TON of questions and he was magnanimous enough to thoroughly answer all of them.  I couldn\'t have made this ENB preset without you.  Thank you!

[color=red][u][b]JawZ:[/u][/b][/color] Another individual that I peppered with questions.  Thank you for all of your help!

[color=red][u][b]bronze316:[/u][/b][/color] For supporting me and letting me use your sharpening code.  Thank you!

[color=red][u][b]mindflux:[/u][/b][/color] Thank you for all of your CK help!  Much appreciated.

[color=red][u][b]opethfeldt:[/u][/b][/color] For letting me use your enbeffect file as the starting point of my enb - thank you!

[color=red][u][b]Kyokushinoyama:[/u][/b][/color] For being a huge support and helping me with the front page - gracias amigo!

[color=red][u][b]T.A.Z.:[/u][/b][/color] For letting me use your lighting esp and altering it for my ENB preset.  Thank you so much!

[color=red][u][b]Rosendaemonin, Kaldaar, schmoops9.:[/u][/b][/color] For taking some amazing screenshots for me.  Thank you!

[img]http://www.imageups.com/img/uploads/big/1444798ce4.png[/img]


[color=YELLOW][u]PERMISSION[/u][/color]
[color=red]I ask you contact me first before using any of my assets.
Thank you[/color][/center]
author: Evok
